name: ÁLABASTARD
description:
ÁLABASTARD is a puzzle-adventure game where you as the player must work with a detective to uncover the nature of your own death. You are brought back as a spirit to serve this purpose. However, the form your spirit manifests into...leads a little to be desired, and complicates your task considerably.

Team Name: Point Link Force

Members:

Corvin Erdos - dfmtymes@gmail.com

Benjamin Brown - benlibrown200@gmail.com

Participating in the STUDENT competition.

Content Created Pre-Jam:

Megascans: Used for the majority of high-quality assets

Soul City: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/soul-city?sessionInvalida...

Construction Site Vol.1: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/construction-site-vol-1-s...

Vehicle Variety Pack: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/bbcb90a03f844edbb20c8b89e...

Realistic Starter VFX Pack: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/realistic-starter-vfx-pac...

Modular Scifi Season 1 Starter Bundle:https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/modular-scifi-season-1-st...

Military Weapons Silver: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/military-weapons-silver

Megascans Cyberpunk Environment:   https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/76e1fa1df6c04146bac765522...

Kitbash Neo City: https://kitbash3d.com/products/mini-kit-neo-city

All characters created with METAHUMAN CREATOR

Facial animations created with live link.

Body animations imported from Mixamo. 

All music created within the team.

Will you roll your way to the truth of the matter?

Made for the Unreal MegaJam 2022 competition.
